values: 星；恒星；星星；星象；星状物；（尤指旅馆或餐馆的）星级；星号；明星；名人；主演；主角；杰出人物；领军人物；优秀人才
主演；担任主角；使成为明星；表现杰出；在…中起主要作用；在…中表现突出
…主演的；标有星号的；最好的；最出色的

synonym.mean: 用星号标于；由…主演，由…担任主角

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 布满星星的；闪闪发光的；星光照耀的；星形的
担任主角的；用星装饰的；用星号标明的；受命运支配的
使担任主角（star的过去式）；用星（形物）装饰
扮演主角，领衔主演；纯锑表面呈星状花纹
演员们；明星界；明星身份

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指围绕太阳运转的行星。
多指恒星，也指天空中的群星。可引申指一切星状物或文体等领域中的知名人物。

word_group.brief_definition: 明星；流行明星；流行歌星
(因头部被撞击等)两眼直冒金星
成名的梦想, (尤指成为艺人的)明星梦

bilingual.source: Because she wanted to be a star.

bilingual.target: 你可以成为明星，罗克珊。
酷炫的墨镜给你明星风范。

bilingual.source: The ex-football star later turned to acting.
bilingual.target: 这位前足球明星后来转行做演员。

bilingual.source: By the time the show ended, the TV star lost his girlfriend.
bilingual.target: 节目结束时，这位电视明星失去了女朋友。

bilingual.source: David asks the volleyball star, Cindy Smith, about her eating habits.
bilingual.target: 大卫询问排球明星辛迪·史密斯的饮食习惯。

bilingual.source: The TV star lost his girlfriend and his show was canceled.
bilingual.target: 这位电视明星失去了他的女朋友，他的节目也被取消了。

bilingual.source: Liu Yu, a fifteen-year-old boy from Shandong, is a running star.
bilingual.target: 刘宇，一个来自山东的十五岁男孩，是一名跑步明星。

bilingual.source: A famous TV star once invited his girlfriend onto his show on April Fool's Day.
bilingual.target: 一位著名的电视明星曾在愚人节邀请他的女朋友上他的节目。

list.abstract: star是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和动词，可以翻译为星级、明星、主演等等。
Star（斯大）精密株式会社，全球最大的打印机生产商之一。Star打印机以创新的技术与优美的打印效果广泛应用于条码、票务、收据和标签等。

yingyinNormal.en: Big star. My big fat Joey star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是大明星，我的胖胖大明星。

yingyinNormal.en: There he is. There's our star. You were great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的明星来了。你演得好棒。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Well then way to go, you big movie star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，那么你去吧，你这个电影明星！

yingyinNormal.en: I haven't seen this dress. Star in a movie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还没有看过这套礼服。去看电影明星吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Although, I should probably tell you, she's a porn star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过我得告诉你，她是色情明星。

yingyinNormal.en: I never got a D before. I used to be the biggest star in middle school. You're still a star, dearest one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以前从没得过D，我在初中时是大明星。你现在仍然是明星，亲爱的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, what was the plan? Waitress for six months and then become a movie star. Was there a plan B? TV star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你原来打算怎么样？当六个月服务员然后成为电影明星。有没有B计划？电视明星。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you know what, bro? You're not star. That is a star. Get you hands off me. Get you hands off me. You don't push my body.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗，你才不是什么明星，那才叫明星。把你手拿开。把你手拿开。不许推我。

yingyinNormal.en: You are gonna be a huge star. I'm gonna hug you. You hug me. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会变成超级大明星。我要抱你。来抱吧。

yingyinNormal.en: What happened to you, Will? You used to be the star of this lab.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么回事，威尔？你曾经是这个实验室的明星。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you're roommate is a soap opera star. Your character is in a coma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的室友是连续剧明星。你的角色在昏迷中。

yingyinNormal.en: Max, the guy who died in front of our shop last night was a rock star.
yingyinNormal.zh: Max 昨晚在我们店门口死翘翘的那人是个摇滚明星。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Lucas was our star in middle school. What were you? I was his cute friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，卢卡斯曾是我们初中的明星。那你呢？我是他可爱的朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, it does! The star player has just arrived. No way! Someone else. Please! Anyone else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那可不，明星选手驾到。门都没有，拜托换别人，谁都好。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it was Ginger. I remember, because when he told me, I said, the movie star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，是金吉儿，我之所以记得是因为他告诉我的时候，我说“电影明星”。

yingyinNormal.en: I know, but you're going to be a TV star and you haven't left me yet. That takes guts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道但你即将成为电视明星而你还没有甩掉我，这需要莫大的勇气啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not talking about you, I'm talking about me. You, my exotic young friend, are my star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是在说你，是说我呢，你，我来自异国他乡的青年朋友，就是我的明星。

yingyinNormal.en: That's ridiculous. I'm not a Star, just a regular famous actor. Yeah and I'm a horrible, horrible, person.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别傻了，我才不是明星，只是一般的名演员。而我是个很糟糕的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Because I'm married. That's right, I am a married woman. And I came to a TV star's apartment to have an affair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我已经结婚了，没错，我是有夫之妇，还跑到一个电视明星家搞外遇。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm done with this conversation. Done with this conversation? In any other family, I would have been the star!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想再跟你讨论这个话题了。不想谈了吗？换在其他家庭我就会是个明星。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 用星装饰的；用星号标明的；担任主角的
n. 领衔主演；主演；（Starring）斯塔林（人名）
adj. 布满星星的；星光照耀的；明星的；有关于明星的；明星特点的；明亮的；星形的；星一样闪亮的

word_family.mean: n. 星；恒星；星形；明星；主角；星宿；命运；运气；星号；星象

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Star</highlight> watchers were among the most esteemed members of Hawaiian society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 观星人曾经是夏威夷社会中最受人敬重的群体。

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why everyone cannot be welcomed on Mauna Kea to embrace their cultural heritage and to study the <highlight>stars</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有理由不欢迎人们去Mauna Kea山拥抱他们的文化遗产并研究星体。

examination_example.sentence: her appreciation of <highlight>star</highlight> watchers' feats in her time
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她对她那个时代的星体观察者们的壮举的欣赏

sense_info_list.en: the principal member of a theater or opera company

examination_example.sentence: They're part of a bunch of celebrities <highlight>starring</highlight> in a new video for World Environment Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们是一群明星中的一员，为世界环境日拍摄了一段新视频。

examination_example.sentence: Some celebrities <highlight>star</highlight> in a new video to urge consumers to cut the use of plastics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些名人在一段新视频中呼吁消费者减少使用塑料。

examination_example.sentence: His reports paralleled the "Willie" cartoons of famed <highlight>Stars</highlight> and Stripes artist Bill Maulden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的报告与著名星条旗艺术家Bill Maulden的“威利”漫画相提并论。

sense_info_list.en: a very talented or popular performer

examination_example.sentence: You save your pennies—£1.75 a week for three months gives you £21— more than enough for a three-course lunch at Michelin-<highlight>starred</highlight> Arbutus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每周节省1.75英镑，为期三个月，这足以让你在米其林星级餐厅Arbutus享用三道菜的午餐。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 主演; 主角; 表演

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 明星；流行明星；流行歌星

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a very talented or popular performer

examination_example.sentence: In recent years, <highlight>star</highlight> chasing has become a common social phenomenon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，追星已成为一种普遍的社会现象。

examination_example.sentence: Many teenagers are so obsessed with <highlight>star</highlight> chasing that they may imitate their idols in every way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多青少年痴迷于追星，他们可能会在各个方面模仿自己的偶像。

examination_example.sentence: Other actors have been revived for advertising purposes: for example, a 2011 advertisement for Dior featured contemporary actress alongside iconic 20th-century <highlight>stars</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他演员也曾因广告宣传的目的获得重生：比如，Dior2011年的一个广告主角就是当代女演员，以及20世纪的几位偶像明星。

sense_info_list.en: a very large ball of burning gas in space that is usually seen from the earth as a point of light in the sky at night

examination_example.sentence: Edwards cites widespread backlash to the digital recreation of Carrie Fisher in Rogue One, a trick later repeated in the recent <highlight>Star</highlight> Wars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Edwards提到，通过数字化技术，Carrie Fisher在电影《侠盗一号》中“重生”，这一技巧之后在最近的《星球大战》中再一次被用到。

sense_info_list.en: the principal member of a theater or opera company
sense_info_list.zh: 主演; 主角; 表演

examination_example.sentence: It was announced that US actor James Dean, who died in 1955, will <highlight>star</highlight> in a Vietnam War film scheduled for release later this year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据宣布，已于1955年去世的美国演员James Dean将在一部越战题材的电影中担任主角，该电影计划再今年晚些时候上映。

word_usage.usage:
star作动词时，表示“担任主角”，star in表示“在...担任主角”或“由…主演”。
示例：She is going to star in a new film.
她将主演一部新电影.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 主演; 主角; 表演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a very large ball of burning gas in space that is usually seen from the earth as a point of light in the sky at night

examination_example.sentence: Companies are so desperate for a hit of <highlight>stars</highlight> that if you delete the survey the company sends you another one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司非常渴望一批受欢迎的明星，以至于如果你删除了调查，公司会再给你发一份。

examination_example.sentence: You can't buy anything without then being asked to provide a rating of a company's performance on a five-<highlight>star</highlight> scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不被迫给一个公司五星好评，你就买不了任何东西。

examination_example.sentence: Consumers expressed higher satisfaction with the one-<highlight>star</highlight> facilities, the lowest rated, than with the five-<highlight>star</highlight> ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消费者对评分最低的一星级设施的满意度高于五星级设施。

examination_example.sentence: More on this study and the <highlight>star</highlight> ratings will appear in a subsequent post.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于这项研究和星级评级的更多内容将出现在下文中。

sense_info_list.en: a very talented or popular performer

examination_example.sentence: A shining display of <highlight>star</highlight> feedback has become the nuclear power sources of the modern economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 明星反馈的光彩表现已经成为现代经济的核动力源。

examination_example.sentence: His message and <highlight>star</highlight> power has spread all over the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的信息和作为明星的影响力传遍了全国。

sense_info_list.en: the principal member of a theater or opera company
sense_info_list.zh: 主演; 主角; 表演

word_usage.usage:
star作动词时，表示“担任主角”，star in表示“在...担任主角”或“由…主演”。
示例：She is going to star in a new film.
她将主演一部新电影.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 主演; 主角; 表演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a very talented or popular performer

examination_example.sentence: The project results from the difficulties many schools have in getting artists—whether an up-and-coming musician or a major movie <highlight>star</highlight>—into schools to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目源于许多学校很难让艺术家——无论是崭露头角的音乐家还是重要的电影明星——进入学校工作。

examination_example.sentence: When I was 13 my only purpose was to become the <highlight>star</highlight> on our football team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我13岁的时候，我唯一的目标就是成为我们足球队的明星球员。

sense_info_list.en: the principal member of a theater or opera company
sense_info_list.zh: 主演; 主角; 表演

examination_example.sentence: Helen <highlight>stars</highlight> in the play, about Queen Elizabeth II and her private meetings with twelve Prime Ministers in the course of sixty years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海伦在这部戏剧中出演，这部戏剧讲述了英国女王伊丽莎白二世以及她在60年间与12位首相的私人会晤。

examination_example.sentence: "I remember opening the door to my room to find seagulls," Burchill said in a recent letter of apology to the 4-<highlight>star</highlight> hotel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伯吉尔在最近给这家4星级酒店的道歉信中写道。“我记得打开我房间的门发现了海鸥。”

examination_example.sentence: Leslie Nielsen's childhood was a difficult one, but he had one particular shining <highlight>star</highlight> in his life—his uncle, who was a well-known actor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莱斯利·尼尔森的童年很艰辛，但他一生中有一颗特别闪亮的明星——他的叔叔，一位著名演员。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 主演; 主角; 表演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 领衔主演；主演；（Starring）斯塔林（人名）

word_family.mean: n. 星；恒星；星形；明星；主角；星宿；命运；运气；星号；星象

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 明星；流行明星；流行歌星

examination_example.sentence: Visitors are amazed to watch the <highlight>stars</highlight> in the huge sky on Mona Island.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客们在莫纳岛上观看天空中的繁星时感到很惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: When the sun goes down, the <highlight>stars</highlight> come out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太阳下山后，星星就出来了。

examination_example.sentence: Jump into the air and spread your arms and legs into a <highlight>star</highlight> shape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跳向空中，把你的胳膊和腿展开成星形。

sense_info_list.en: a very talented or popular performer

examination_example.sentence: Turn on the TV and you'll probably  see beautiful models, handsome actors and fit sports <highlight>stars</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打开电视，你可能会看到美丽的模特、英俊的演员和健壮的体育明星。

examination_example.sentence: Family members should encourage kids to be <highlight>stars</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家人们应该鼓励孩子成为明星。

examination_example.sentence: They make actors and film <highlight>stars</highlight> famous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们让演员和电影明星出名。

sense_info_list.en: the principal member of a theater or opera company
sense_info_list.zh: 主演; 主角; 表演

examination_example.sentence: When Chaplin visited a theatre, a dancer brought his son on stage, and Chaplin knew he had his co-<highlight>star</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当卓别林参观剧院时，一位舞蹈演员带着他的儿子上台，卓别林知道他有他的联袂主演者了。

examination_example.sentence: She also <highlight>stars</highlight> in the 2015 film A Ballerina's Tale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她还主演了2015年的电影《芭蕾舞者的故事》。

word_usage.usage:
star作动词时，表示“担任主角”，star in表示“在...担任主角”或“由…主演”。
示例：She is going to star in a new film.
她将主演一部新电影.
